results.content: You are allowed to refuse most medical care for your children; the exceptions are medical care that is needed to the best understanding of medical science .

results.content: Care that is merely a little helpful (erythromycin in the eyes of newborns, well-child checkups, circumcision, treatment of scrapes/bruises, tonsillectomy for moderate snoring, etc etc) are the parents' decision .
